name: Mia W
text: The new owners have really turned the whole place around. It looks very clean, and the owner offers great deals and specials everyday. I was impressed by the quality and taste of their food, plus it’s affordable! I’m never going back to the …More

name: Oscar Martinez
text: Always a pleasant experience coming here. The new owners have really improved this place. I really like their specials, and the quality and taste of their pizzas and calzones. The best thing about ordering here is that they always recognize …More

name: Juanita Buckles
text: We wanted pizza, figured we would try Figaro's, and boy are we glad we did! Polite service is just the beginning. I'm not a "pizza person". But this pizza---and we've tried several varieties now---is delicious, clear to the tender crust. Great prices, too. Our fave (so far) is the chicken bacon with garlic. Can't get enough of it.

name: Vincent Cruz
text: It was my first time at this place and I was really impressed when the owner told me that they accept expired coupons/ coupons from their competitors. Even though they were really busy at the time, both the employees were working hard to …More

name: Brian B
text: Not the greatest pizza but decent, cheap, and convenient.  You can take and bake or have them bake it for you.  Pretty good the night of, but it doesn't hold up as leftovers like some pizzas do.

name: Renzo Howard
text: I really love their Mexican Fiesta and chicken calzone! My kids really like their cheesy breadsticks. Since the new owners have taken over, I have seen a big change in the quality of their food and service. The staff is also very polite and friendly. Overall, I am very happy and satisfied from this place.

name: Anthony Dobson
text: Very delicious pizza! The owners even honor expired coupons, whether theirs or not! You can even make your purchase on food stamps, and pay $1 to bake fresh

name: ross smith
text: This place is awesome. The food was great, the staff was friendly and helpful. Will definitely be coming back again!

name: Matthew Lee
text: Great pizza, quick, and friendly. Thanks for the perfect service Paul!

text: Very polite new owners , have a new menu compared to the old owners . Fresh taste . Verry happiness I came here for family dinner night !!
